name: Kanak Jan Kalyan Samiti
briefDescription: Kanak Jan Kalyan Samiti is a non-governmental and non-political organization registered under Indian Societiesâ€™ Registration Act, 1860 in 2002-03 by a group of social activists in Bundelkhand region of Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh. It exclusively focuses on socially and economically distressed communities along with disables, tribes, women, children, and aged.
